content: --धन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} rich in religious penance. {2} pious, ascetic. {3} consisting in penance, (--नः ‘rich in penance’, an ascetic, devotee; रम्यास्तपोधनानां क्रियाः <ls>Ś. 1. 13</ls>; शमप्रधानेषु तपोधनेषु <ls n="Ś.">2. 7</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">4. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 23</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 19</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 242.</ls>
